description:
Jahi tries to get Doux to hate humans by making her meet a demon hunter.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Maou no Musume wa Ningen o Shiitake Sugiru!! / Maou no Sokkin wa Kyouiku ga Sugiru!!
The Demon King`s Daughter Must Shrewdly Oppress the Humans!! / The Demon King`s Advisor Teaches Too Well!!
魔王の娘は人間をしいたけすぎる!! / 魔王の側近は教育がすぎる!!
